startPage.title: Blend in or stand out - What's your strategy?
startPage.description: It's not about what is right, it's about what most people think. Let's get started!

learnMorePage.title: Learn more about Odd One Out!
learnMorePage.description: In this mode, the goal is to NOT be the odd one out. The challenge is to guess what others will pick—can you predict what they'll choose? You'll only score points if someone else thinks the same way. The player with the most points at the end wins!

createGame.title: Enter questions to challenge the crowd.

title: The stage is set, start when you are ready
Everything's in place! Ready to start the challenge?
Your game is good to go—let's play!
You're all set! Time to get the game started.
code.description: Share this code with your friends to join the game.

joinGame.title: Ready to play?
joinGame.description: Your task is to match the crowd's answers - Let's see how well you can sync with the group!
joinGame.subHeading: Enter Game Code and your name

waiting: The fun is about to begin!

winner.title: Congratulations!
winner.description: You matched the crowd the best and have claimed the top spot at the podium!

podium.title: Well done!
podium.description: You made it to the podium with your crowd-pleasing answers..

loser.title: Better luck next time!
loser.description: Your scores did not put you on the podium, you'll get them next time!

right: You're in sync with the group, points for you!
Great thinking! You matched the crowd.
You're on the same wavelength—point scored!
Right on! You've joined the majority.
You're thinking like the rest—well done!
wrong: You went you own way, no points for you.
A little off this time—no points.
Not quite with the group! Try again next time.
Thinking outside the box, but no points.
Missed the mark! Better luck next round.

labels.waitForAdmin: Waiting for admin to enter points..
